title: Alfred Hitchcock - Jamaica Inn (1939)
description:
Title: Jamaica Inn
Director: Alfred Hitchcock
Year: 1939
Language: English


A Band of Pirates sheltering in the Jamaica Inn, make their living by arranging shipwrecks for profit. Mary is a young Irish orphan sent to live with her aunt and uncle in Cornwall. She gets herself in trouble by discovering that Uncle Joss is the leader of the Pirates...

Jamaica Inn was the last Hitchcock film shot in the UK before starting his Hollywood career.

Amazing performance by Charles Laughton. This film maybe the only Hitchcock film where an actor is more dominant than Hitchcock himself.
